-e ---

𓂝 Letter ʾ ꜥ ⋍ A ⲉ O 𒀉 Arm or Elle 𓂢 L ⲩ 󲀍 󲀎 u̯

𓂝 transliterated by convention as ꜥ Ꜥ ʿ ayin, being considered possible sound values in the 19th century ⇔ 𓄿 ꜣ

𓂞 𓂝 𓂞 𓂠 𓂟 𓂦 𓂥 𓂡 𓂢 Many words and roots

𓂜 𒀀𒀀 a¬a 𓂝𓂝 Handi ≈ anti

𔗷 a 𓂝 अस aṃs 𔗷 𐀖 mi 𔗸 arm ⋍ 𓂟 manu ⇔ elusive Elamite 𒈨 me

Carpe

R > L

The 'r' component in arm/ⲕⲁϩ becomes evident in
𓇋 𓂝 𓎛 | moon | 𐎊𐎗𐎃 yrḫ ⲓⲟϩ ioh 𐌕𐌉𐌖𐌓 tiur 𓂝 𓈙 𓇫 | cedar | ارز arz 𓆓 𓎛 𓂋 𓅱 𓄛 𓏪 leather lacings | Dheru++ (der = leather in Anatolian languages)
𓆓 𓎛 𓂝 𓅱 𓄛 𓏪 leather lacings | dharu/dharmu ++ derma=skin in Greek
The 'r' is also carried by 𓅱 •wrn though.
